room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: My group broke out of Hostage! It was well laid out. Not too easy or too difficult. The staff was great!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: The Hostage room was a lot of fun, we would probably still be in there if our lady upfront wouldn't have kept us on track!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: We had a great time escaping from Hostage - of course, it always better if you succeed in your mission. A great mix of puzzles and our team of three were able to make our way through them with a little help from our excellent Game Master, Drew. As usual, Hostage lived up to the quality I've come to expect from Breakout Games. Thank you for a great evening.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: We were bored on a Tuesday afternoon and wanted something fun and challenging to do. Breakout were able to get us a spot! We had so much fun here with Mitchell! He was fun and helpful when we needed it. Even though it was just my fianc√© and myself but we still had a blast! We will definitely be back again.
